title: Man shot in back in Southbridge
location: 400 block of Townsend St., Wilmington, DE 19801
summary:
A 25-year-old man was shot in the back Sunday night in Wilmington' Southbridge neighborhood. 

Officers responding to the 400 block of Townsend St. in regard to Shot Spotter notification found the wounded man in the 400 block of A St. suffering a gunshot wound to his back. The man was treated by New Castle County Paramedics and  taken to Christiana Hospital, where he was reported to be stable.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Two men shot in Wilmington as city leaders discuss gun violence
location: In the area of 1100 block of Maryland Ave, Wilmington, DE 19805
summary:
The city's Shot Spotter Notification System alerted police to gunfire and a shooting scene was found in the 1100 block of Maryland Ave. 

Police found a 22-year-old man shot in the lower right leg.  Then, authorities were told that another 22-year-old man had turned up a St. Francis Hospital with a gunshot wound to his abdomen.  Both are listed in stable condition.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Man walks into Wilmington Hospital with gunshot wound
location: In the area of Lancaster Ave. and S. Van Buren St., Wilmington, DE 19805
summary:
A 25-year-old man showed up at Wilmington Hospital Tuesday afternoon with a gunshot wound to his leg.

The victim told police he was walking in the area of Lancaster Ave. and Van Buren streets when he felt a pain in his right leg, an official said.

A search of the area yielded no evidence of gunfire.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Man shot in head becomes city's most recent homicide
location: In the area of 600 block of N. Pine St., Wilmington, DE 19801
summary:
At about 1:20 a.m., officers responded to the 600 block of N. Pine Street in reference to a Shot Spotter  notification of gunfire in the area. 

There, police found a 23-year-old man victim lying on the sidewalk suffering from a gunshot wound to his head.   The victim was rushed to Christiana Hospital where he later died. 

Police have identified the victim as Nycire Mills of New Castle.

victims.name: Nycire  Mills
victims.status: Mills was killed during the incident.

title: Teens rob man, shot him in knee
location: In the area of 800 block of W. 3rd St., Wilmington, DE 19801
summary:
Police on patrol heard shot fired in the area of 4th and Monroe.  Seconds later, officers saw a gold minivan fleeing at a high rate of speed from the area.

Police stopped the vehicle.  The driver, Darius Wrenn,18, and a 15-year-old boy from New Castle were charged in the robbery/shooting.  Four other people in the van were not charged.

Police found a crime scene along with a wounded 61-year-old man, who was shot in the knee, in the 800 block of W. 3rd St.  The victim was taken to Christiana Hospital and admitted in good condition.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: Man was wounded during the incident.

suspects.name: Darius Wrenn
suspects.about: Wrenn, from Sharon Hill, Pa., was charged with Robbery in the 1st Degree, Assault in the 1st Degree, Possession of a Firearm During the Commission of a Felony, Possession of a Firearm by a Person Prohibited, and Conspiracy 2nd Degree.

suspects.name: Unidentified Boy
suspects.about: Unnamed teen was charged with Robbery in the 1st Degree, Assault in the 1st Degree, Possession of a Firearm During the Commission of a Felony, Possession of a Firearm by a Person Prohibited, and Conspiracy 2nd Degree.

title: Man shot in neck on Tatnall St.
location: In the area of 1800 block of Tatnall St., Wilmington, DE 19802
summary: Police were informed of a shooting in the 1800 block of N. Tatnall St.  Responding officers found a 36-year-old man victim suffering from a gunshot to the lower neck area.  He was taken to Wilmington Hospital and is listed in stable condition.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Man and woman shot inside Eastide house
location: In the area of 900 block of Clifford Brown Walk, Wilmington, DE 19801
summary:
Wilmington police responded to the 900 block of Clifford Brown Walk, where the found two victims inside a residence. 

A woman suffered a graze to her shoulder by a bullet that than penetrated her neck, police said. A man inside with her took a graze wound to the chest. 

Both were taken to Christiana Hospital in stable condition, police said.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: Man was wounded during the incident.

victims.name: Unidentified Woman
victims.status: Woman was wounded during the incident.

title: Man found shot multiple times
location: In the area of 100 block of E. 24th St., Wilmington, DE 19802
summary:
Officers responded to a Shot Spotter notification just before 2 a.m. Wednesday in the 100 block of E. 24th St. and found a man suffering from multiple gunshot wounds to his lower body, police said. 

The man was listed in critical but stable condition when he was taken to Christiana Hospital, police said.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: Man was wounded during the incident.

title: Man on Concord Avenue shot in shoulder
location: In the area of 300 block of Concord Ave., Wilmington, DE 19802
summary:
A 38-year-old man was hospitalized after being shot in the shoulder Thursday.

City officers responded to the 300 block of Concord Ave. about 5 p.m. after hearing gunshots in the area, police said.

There, police found the shooting victim. He was taken to Christiana Hospital where he was listed as stable.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Shooting on E. 23rd St. critically injures man
location: In the area of 100 block of E. 23rd St, Wilmington, DE 19802
summary:
A shooting Monday night in Wilmington left a 24-year-old man in critical but stable condition.

Police were patrolling in the area of East 23rd St. when they heard shots firedÂ just before 8:10 p.m.  A crime scene was located in the 100 block of E. 23 rd St.

The victim was taken to Wilmington Hospital by private vehicle.  He was wounded in his left torso.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.
